G

Game - Class in com.jackychu.app.tictactoe
This class store the tic-tac-toe (3x3) game status.
Each cell on the board is one of three kind of values: 0 for no mark, 1 for player 1, 2 for player 2.
Players who is O or X depends on UI representation
TODO: Enhance to support dimension larger than 3
Game() - Constructor for class com.jackychu.app.tictactoe.Game
Default create 3x3 game.
Game(int) - Constructor for class com.jackychu.app.tictactoe.Game
Create nxn game with input dimension.
